Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration policy. For example, arn:aws:securityhub:us-east-1:123456789012:configuration-policy/a1b2c3d4-5678-90ab-cdef-EXAMPLE11111.

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of the configuration policy.
The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy. A self-managed configuration has no UUID. The  	identifier of a self-managed configuration is SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB.
Indicates whether the service that the configuration policy applies to is enabled in the policy.
The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy was last updated.
